thread.title: Go Update Your Facebook App Right Now

title: Go Update Your Facebook App Right Now
text:
Go Update Your Facebook App Right Now 
Wired Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Facebook recently came under fire for sucking the life out of our iPhones. Even when it wasn’t running in the background, and even with iOS 9’s new attention to saving your battery life, Facebook was still draining iPhones everywhere. 
Today Facebook, addressed the problem in...
